mapper.select:
SELECT TFD.id, TFD.system, TFD.module, TFD.relativePath, TFD.filename, TFD.filenameExtension, TFD.viewUrl, TFD.deleteDate, TFD.createDate, TFD.lastUpdateDate FROM CORE_FILE_DEFINITION TFD WHERE
AND TFD.ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CORE_FILE_DEFINITION ( ID, SYSTEM, MODULE, RELATIVEPATH, FILENAMEEXTENSION, FILENAME, VIEWURL, DELETEDATE, CREATEDATE, LASTUPDATEDATE ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{system}, #{module}, #{relativePath}, #{filenameExtension}, #{filename}, #{uviewUrlrl}, #{deleteDate}, #{createDate}, #{lastUpdateDate} )

INSERT INTO CORE_FILE_DEFINITION_HIS ( ID, SYSTEM, MODULE, RELATIVEPATH, FILENAMEEXTENSION, FILENAME, VIEWURL, DELETEDATE, CREATEDATE, LASTUPDATEDATE ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{system}, #{module}, #{relativePath}, #{filenameExtension}, #{filename}, #{viewUrl}, #{deleteDate}, #{createDate}, #{lastUpdateDate} )
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM CORE_FILE_DEFINITION WHERE
AND ID = #{id}
mapper.update:
UPDATE CORE_FILE_DEFINITION
VIEWURL = #{viewUrl,javaType=java.lang.String},
RELATIVEPATH = #{relativePath,javaType=java.lang.String},
FILENAME = #{filename,javaType=java.lang.String},
FILENAMEEXTENSION = #{filenameExtension,javaType=java.lang.String},
DELETEDATE = #{deleteDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
LASTUPDATEDATE = #{lastUpdateDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
WHERE ID = #{id}
